feature.description.composer_reloaded.ta: Synchronizes players' target blocks to the client. Frequency controls how often (in ticks) updates are sent. Changing this or disabling it may break other mods.
Synchronizes players' target entities to the client. Frequency controls how often (in ticks) updates are sent. Changing this or disabling it may break other mods.
